title: India financial crime fighting agency will probe Paytm Payments Bank if money laundering found
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on Wednesday ordered the payments bank unit of One 97 Communications, popularly known as Paytm, to stop accepting fresh deposits in its accountsor popular wallets from March.
